extension.name: PCS Mid-Menu Slider™
extension.author: Jason Buzzeo
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2014 Paradigm Custom Solutions. All rights reserved.
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 3; see LICENSE.txt
extension.description: A module to display a stylish image based navigation with a text overlay that slides in on mouse over and disappears on mouse out.

field.name: text1
field.label: Slider Text
field.description: Enter the message you want to appear on the slider

field.name: textColor1
field.label: Text Color
field.description: Choose a color for the text. Default = White.

field.name: textSize1
field.label: Text size
field.description: Enter size for slider text. Default = .8em

field.name: bgColor1
field.label: Slider Background Color
field.description: Choose a color for the slider background. Default = Black.

field.name: link1
field.label: Select a Menu Item
field.description: Menu page that will be used when the user clicks on this item.

field.name: opacity1
field.label: Select an option
field.description: Percent the hover image will fade away to reveal the text slider behind it.

field.name: sliderHeight1
field.label: Slider Height
field.description: Enter size for slider. if left blank the slider will fill the entire available area.

field.name: speed1
field.label: Slider speed
field.description: Customize how fast or slow the slider moves. Default = 500.
